alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Saratoga and southern Washington Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenwich, or 9 miles northeast of Mechanicville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Greenwich, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Cossayuna, Coveville, West Cambridge, Battenville, Center Falls, Wayville, Myers Corners, Rexleigh, Middle Falls, Eagleville, Bemis Heights, Anaquassacook, North Cambridge and Fly Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington
